title: Lvl 31, 20 unlocked (not free rotation, actually unlocked), can't queue ranked

replies.body:
Hey Zaodon, that's kinda weird. Is the option simply unavailable (stating that you need to fulfill the requirements) or does it give you an error message when you try to queue into a Ranked Gamed? Can your friends invite you to a party for a Ranked Game? If you're still having issues, hit up my colleagues via the Support Site here: 

- https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new 

From there, my colleagues can take a look at the account and see what might be causing you to be unable to queue into a Ranked Game.
